attributes.action: sack all MPs including PM, secretaries, researchers, sycophants and hangers-on and return the money saved to the electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of the waste engendered by the parliamentary process, the waste of money represented by MPs and all their staff. The money saved by removing all these people should be returned to the electorate to enable them to use it far more productively.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
